item.title: Bullying. Facts and figures
item.description: Bullying is an ongoing misuse of power in relationships through repeated verbal, physical and/or social behaviour that causes physical and/or psychological harm. It can involve an individual or a group misusing their power over one or more persons. Bullying can happen in person or online, and it can be obvious (overt) or hidden (covert). Bullying of any form or for any reason can have long-term effects on those involved, including bystanders.

item.title: Classes for adults

item.title: Contact
item.description: Get your 2 week FREE trial by simply submitting this form! Your Name Your Phone Number Email Address An email address is required. Message You are also welcome to send your questions via this form or call us on 0432 785 795

item.title: Do Martial Arts Classes Actually Help Your Kid To Fight?
item.description: Since the karate craze of the 1970s, countless armies of kids have punched, kicked, and yelled “hi YAH!” at suburban dojos and community centre martial arts classes across the country. Martial arts training fosters discipline, encourages physical fitness and gets your kid out of your hair for a couple of hours a week. But as a parent, you may wonder: Does this kind of training actually help kids fight back, should they need to?

item.title: Location
item.description: Our classes are held at Beecroft Uniting Church - 82 Beecroft road, Beecroft. The location is just 5 minutes walk from Beecroft train station or 2 minutes from Beecroft Place. Here is the map: If you have any question, don’t hesitate to call us on 0432 785 795.

item.title: What is Martial Arts for kids
item.description: Martial arts isn’t all about kicking and punching. Violent TV shows and movies might be responsible for some of the bad rap that the sport gets; in reality, martial arts will help your child much more than it will hurt. Whether your kid is bursting with energy or shy in most social situations, martial arts can go a long way toward developing qualities and habits in your young ones that can last a lifetime.
